item.title: [GROOVY-9906] ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException when compiling method call with many overloaded methods
item.description:

comments.comment:
Hi!
Many thanks for fixing this issue.

How are the chances that this fix is backported to a 2.5.x version?
I can take a look and consider possible impact. I have been focusing on getting fixes from master into 3_0_X.
Of course. Thanks for having a look!
Grails joint build failed. GROOVY-9662 changes likely have not been applied to Grails copy of StreamingJsonBuilder. I'm not sure if this change can stay in 2_5_X.

I know it's hard to backport such changes. We ourselves are to blame that we are still on 2.5.x

One last try: Would it be an option to fall back to the implementation from 2.5.13, which didn't seem to have this bug? But I assume that the changes were made for a reason so I'm unable to see the consequences of the reverting.
After some local testing and a rollback, the Grails joint build is still failing without this change. So I must conclude that something was changed on the Grails side after March 19th.
